summary: Add support for building the Ruby SDK from source during gem installation. Currently the source gem doesn't work, but the SDK could include necessary sdk-core components to enable building on `gem install --platform ruby` for users in obscure environments where pre-built gems aren't available.
userImpact: Users in environments without pre-built gem support can now build and install the SDK from source if Rust is available.
proposedFix: Include all necessary sdk-core components in the gem and add a smoke test that validates `gem install --platform ruby` can build successfully when Rust is available.
keyQuote: we very well could include all the sdk-core stuff needed to build the entire SDK on gem install
